flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=32000>>32000 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 32000-1200=<<32000-1200=30800>>30800 dollars.
#### 30800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3200, not 32000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
